alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Grainger; Greene; Hamblen; Hawkins; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 10:23PM CDT until August 14 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Cocke County in east Tennessee... West central Greene County in east Tennessee... Central Grainger County in east Tennessee... Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 1215 AM EDT. * At 1123 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jefferson City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Jefferson City, Rutledge, Bean Station, White Pine, New Market, Baneberry, Parrottsville, Russellville, and Mosheim. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 420 and 424. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cocke; Grainger; Greene; Hamblen; Hawkins; Jefferson
